      • plus

        public Matrix plus​(Matrix matrix)
            throws InvalidDimensionsException
        Returns a matrix that is the sum of a given matrix and this matrix.
        Parameters:
        matrix - Matrix to add
        Returns:
        Sum of the matrices.
        Throws:
        InvalidDimensionsException - If the matrices are not the same size.

      • minus

        public Matrix minus​(Matrix matrix)
             throws InvalidDimensionsException
        Returns a matrix that is the difference of a given matrix and this matrix.
        Parameters:
        matrix - Matrix to subtract
        Returns:
        Difference of the matrices.
        Throws:
        InvalidDimensionsException - If the matrices are not the same size.

      • times

        public Matrix times​(Matrix matrix)
             throws InvalidDimensionsException
        Multiplies this Matrix by a given Matrix and returns the product Matrix. Note that matrix multiplication is not commutative.
        Parameters:
        matrix - Matrix to be multiplied by this Matrix
        Returns:
        product of the two matrices
        Throws:
        InvalidDimensionsException - if the number of rows of this matrix is not equal to the number of columns of the specified matrix.

      • scalarTimesRow

        public Matrix scalarTimesRow​(double scalar,
                             int row)
        Returns a Matrix that has multiplied a scalar by a row of this Matrix.
        Parameters:
        scalar - number by which each entry in the specified row will be multiplied
        row - row being multiplied by a scalar
        Returns:
        Matrix with the modified row
